item.title: Public Boolean help
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

i have no idea why this wont work

i decleared this

public boolean noTelePort() {
if((absX >=3686  && absX <=3320 && absY >=2945  && absY <=3983 ) ||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

those are cords for wilderness above level 20

this is what i have for my teleports and my log out

case 166:
if(noTelePort()){
sendMessage("You Can Not Teleport Above LvL 20 Wild"); 
}
else if(!noTelePort()){
customCommand("Smith");
}
break;

log out

					case 9154: //Log out
					if(noTelePort()){
					sendMessage("You Can Not Teleport Above LvL 20 Wild"); 
					}
					else if(!noTelePort()){
					logout();
					PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Server] " +playerName+ " has logged out";
					savefile = true;
                                        }
					break;

it compiled fine, i have no idea why this is not working, please help.
